business.headline: Sensex, Nifty closing: Top stocks that gained and lost on BSE, NSEIT and auto sector stocks dragged the market down. The fall in IT and auto stocks is linked to concerns over US reciprocal tariffs, which are set to come into effect on April 2.

Thailand stock exchange halts trading after earthquake hits MyanmarFollowing tremors from the Myanmar earthquake, the Stock Exchange of Thailand suspended all trading for the Friday afternoon session.

DA hiked by 2%: Here's how much central government employees will earn nowWith the 2% hike, DA has now risen from 53% to 55%. Pensioners will also experience a similar increase in their Dearness Relief (DR).

Sensex, Nifty end FY25 on a weak note as Trump tariffs weigh on Dalal StreetThe S&P BSE Sensex lost 191.51 points to close at 77,414.92, while the NSE Nifty50 was down 72.60 points to end at 23,519.35.

How India saw a billionaire boom in just 10 yearsIndia's billionaire club isn't just growing—it's thriving. A decade ago, cracking this list was a rare feat. Now, it's happening faster than ever. Even with market swings and economic headwinds, the country keeps adding new names to its billionaire ranks.

Salary boost for central government employees, DA hiked by 2%With this revision, DA will rise from 53% to 55%, offering a salary boost to employees. The last DA increase took place in July 2024, when it was raised from 50% to 53%.
Missed TDS on rent? Here's what tax department is doingThe law requires tenants to deduct TDS at 2% on rent above Rs 50,000 per month, in case the landlord is a resident Indian.

India offers to lower US farm tariffs, looks to strengthen trade ties: ReportIndia-US trade talk: The government has proposed reducing import duties on several US agricultural products, including almonds, walnuts, cranberries, pistachios, and lentils.

Why is stock market falling today? 3 things investors need to knowThe S&P BSE Sensex was down 339.66 points to 77,266.77 at 1:13 pm and the NSE Nifty50 traded 100.45 points lower to trade at 23,491.50. Here are three important points retail investors need to know.

India's billionaires have wealth bigger than Saudi Arabia's GDP. Check detailsIndia's billionaires now have a combined wealth that exceeds the entire economy of Saudi Arabia. India ranks third globally in the number of billionaires, behind the United States and China.

Health insurance rejected? Here are 5 things you need to knowUnderstanding why health insurance claims are rejected is important as it will help you avoid unnecessary stress or financial burden during medical emergencies.

How this scheme can help you save Rs 20 lakh in 15 years for daughterIf you are planning for your daughter's higher education expenses, the Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana (SSY) can be a great savings option.

entertainment.headline: James Gunn's Superman has a cameo by a big Hollywood star: ReportFilmmaker James Gunn's Superman will feature a surprise cameo by a major Hollywood star. Earlier, it was being speculated that Hollywood superstar Tom Cruise would star in it.

Prithviraj directed to make changes to Empuraan after claims of hurting sentimentsL2: Empuraan producer Gokulam Gopalan has said that he has asked director-actor Prithviraj to make changes to the film after it was claimed that it hurt the sentiments of a certain section of the audience.

Not all nepos: Rising above the 'nepo kid' tag with talentThe debate around 'nepo kids' in Bollywood continues, with new generations facing sharper scrutiny. Actors like Babil Khan, Zahan Kapoor, and Aditya Rawal are quietly sidestepping the hype by focusing on content-driven cinema, proving their talent beyond their familial connections.
Priyanka Chopra's Citadel Season 2 postponed to 2026: ReportAll Citadel spinoff series have been put on hold until Season 2 premieres. The shooting for the second season wrapped in November 2024.

Salman Khan praises Rashmika, shares how she shot for Sikandar, Pushpa 2 togetherBollywood superstar Salman Khan heaped praise on his Sikandar co-star Rashmika Mandanna and said that the actor's dedication to her craft was inspiring.

Salman Khan reveals why he never prays for a film's successSalman Khan, in an exclusive interview, spoke about how he has never prayed for his films. The actor mentioned that his film's success lies in the hands of the audience.

Salman Khan reveals Salim Khan's reaction to his debut film Biwi Ho Toh AisiSalman Khan recalled how his father, veteran screenwriter Salim Khan, joined him for the Sikandar trailer launch. The actor even reminisced the time he showed his debut film, Biwi Ho Toh Aisi, to his father.

Dupahiya 2: Gajraj Rao, Renuka Shahane and cast announce new season with fun videoAfter Dupahiya captivated audiences with its sharp humour and outstanding performances, Prime Video renewed the show for a second season.

I don't even sit on set: Salman Khan shuts down work ethic rumoursSalman Khan, in an interview with India Today, reflected on his work ethic and addressed rumours about him being late to shoots. The actor recalled his journey in cinema and said how disciplined he is.

Empuraan box office Day 2: Mohanlal, Prithviraj Sukumaran's film earns Rs 33 croreDirected by Prithviraj Sukumaran, L2: Empuraan earned Rs 33 crore in two days. Starring Mohanlal in the lead, the action thriller released in theatres on March 27.

Will Smith addresses Chris Rock Oscars slap in new albumWill Smith's latest album, Based on a True Story, dives into the controversy surrounding his Oscars slap incident. During Oscars 2022, Will slapped Chris Rock when the latter cracked a joke on Will's wife, Jada Pinkett-Smith.

Chris Brown announces 2025 Breezy Bowl XX tour: Dates, tickets & moreChris Brown announces his 2025 Breezy Bowl XX Stadium Tour, celebrating 20 years in music. The tour spans Europe and North America, with tickets expected to sell out fast.

Megan Fox vs. Machine Gun Kelly: Who has the higher net worth Megan Fox and Machine Gun Kelly welcomed a baby girl amid their turbulent relationship. With MGK's $25 million fortune exceeding Megan's $8 million net worth, his music and investments give him the financial edge.

The Family Man 3: Manoj Bajpayee confirms Jaideep Ahlawat in cast, November releaseManoj Bajpayee has confirmed Jaideep Ahlawat's inclusion in The Family Man 3. He also said that the show will premiere on Prime Video in November.

Maren Morris' new single 'carry me through' kicks off Dreamsicle eraCountry star Maren Morris unveils Carry Me Through, a soulful anthem from her upcoming album Dreamsicle. Set for release on May 9, it follows a year of personal and artistic reinvention.
Kanye West sued for unauthorised sample after refusing clearance over antisemitismGerman singer Alice Merton sues Kanye West for using her song Blindside without permission in Gun to My Head.

Vikram's Veera Dheera Sooran release delay not due to financial issues: ProducerVeera Dheera Sooran's producer addressed the release delay of the film. He wrote on X how it was not due to financial issues.

Avengers Doomsday: Marvel's bet on nostalgia or beginning of another end-game?Avengers Infinity Saga - Infinity War and Endgame - had huge impact on cinema when they released. But will the upcoming Avengers film - Avengers Doomsday - hold the same effect?

Shivangi Joshi sends love to boyfriend Kushal Tandon on his 40th birthdayOn actor Kushal Tandon's birthday, his girlfriend Shivangi Joshi showered him with love through a heartfelt wish. The actor turned 40 on March 28.

general news.headline: Over 1,000 killed in Myanmar, Thailand quakes; India aids with Operation BrahmaThe death toll from the powerful quake surpassed 1,000, according to a Myanmar military leader, with a US agency warning that the toll could exceed 10,000. Strong tremors were also felt in parts of India, including Meghalaya and Manipur, as well as in Bangladesh, particularly in Dhaka and Chattogram, and in China.

US university responds after India Today report on row over 'Hinduphobic' courseA student and Hindu-American activist raised concerns about the University of Houston's Lived Hindu Religion course. Vasant Bhatt told India Today Digital that he complained to the university about the course being "Hinduphobic" and distorting "India's political landscape". The university, in a detailed response to India Today Digital, has defended the course.

Elderly Karnataka couple dies by suicide after losing Rs 50 lakh to cyber fraudThe couple, both retired and formerly employed at the Maharashtra Mantralaya, did not inform anyone about the threats and extortion.

'Never talk back': US model claims Andrew Tate thrashed, choked her during sexModel and influencer, Brianna Stern, detailed in her lawsuit that Andrew Tate sexually and physically assaulted her during a sexual encounter as he hit her in the face and head, and at one point the pressure on her neck was so strong that it made her lose consciousness.

Noida man finds love on dating app, ends up losing Rs 6.5 croreAccording to Daljit's complaint, he met the woman, Anita Chauhan on a dating app back in December 2024. After persuading him to invest in the trading website, the man said that he had booked Rs 24,000 in profits on an initial investment of Rs 3.2 lakh.

Delhi blows hot and cold: Decoding 7-degree temperature drop in 2 daysThe Meteorological Department has forecasted that the temperature will remain below normal but is expected to rise again in the coming week. So, what caused this sudden drop in temperatures? Find out
Air Force engineer shot dead at Prayagraj home, accused on the runIAF civil engineer SN Mishra was shot dead early Saturday when an unknown assailant called out to him from the lawn of his bungalow.

Man caught smoking beedi on Surat-Kolkata flight, arrested before takeoffAccording to police officials, the flight was scheduled to depart at 4.35 pm, but a technical issue caused a delay. At around 5.30 pm, the air hostess detected the smell of smoke and alerted her senior officer.

CSK vs RCB: MS Dhoni mania at Chepauk turns CSK fandom into cringefestIPL 2025: CSK's passionate fandom has morphed into blind Dhoni worship, with fans prioritising his presence over the team's success. Cheering his late entry at No. 9 in a lost cause in the game against RCB at Chepauk on March 28 exposed a cringeworthy shift from cricketing sense to sheer idolisation.

Udaipur school principal dances to Haryanvi folk song at students' request in videoA school farewell in Udaipur, Rajasthan, turned into an unforgettable event when students asked their principal to dance, and he actually did.

What is 'brain flossing', and can it scientifically reduce stress?Ever heard of brain flossing? If yes, great, if not, we need some talking to do as it is trending.

India-US tariffs will work out well, PM Modi is a very smart man: TrumpUS President Donald Trump reaffirmed his concerns over India's high tariffs while praising Prime Minister Narendra Modi as a "great friend" and "very smart man".

Bihar Board 10th topper list 2025: 3 students secured rank 1 with 97.80%The Bihar School of Education (BSEB) has declared the Class 10 results for 2025. Sakshi Kumari secured the top position with 489 marks and 97.80 per cent, followed by Anshu Kumari and Ranjan Verma with the same score.
Priyanka Chopra's Citadel Season 2 postponed to 2026: ReportAll Citadel spinoff series have been put on hold until Season 2 premieres. The shooting for the second season wrapped in November 2024.

Faridabad woman hides in cupboard as cow, bull take over her bedroom. Video goes viralA Faridabad-based woman found herself trapped inside her own home when a cow and a bull barged in and refused to leave.

Rohit Sharma on regaining MI success after IPL 2024 low: Mindset has not changedRohit Sharma has reiterated his commitment to Mumbai Indians, saying that his mindset has changed, and he wants to win more trophies with the franchise. MI hit a new low in 2024 as they finished at the bottom of the table in IPL 2024.

Haven't done a good job: JD Vance to Denmark amid Trump's Greenland buyout threatDuring a visit to Greenland for a few hours, US Vice President JD Vance scolded Denmark for "underinvesting" on the Arctic island, which the Scandinavian nation has owned for over 300 years.

sports.headline: BCCI postpones central contracts, England tour preparations meetingThe BCCI has decided to postpone the meeting to decide on the central contracts for the upcoming season and the England tour preparations. The meeting was set to take place in Guwahati on Saturday, March 29.

Bumrah is recovering from the back injury he suffered during the Border-Gavaskar Trophy.

Phil Salt on Virat Kohli partnership: RCB were clear why they wanted me herePhil Salt opened up on his partnership with Virat Kohli and claimed that the RCB management was very clear about his role when he was bought during the auction. Salt and Kohli have started to gel well at the top for RCB.

CSK coaches don't have guts to ask MS Dhoni to bat higher: Manoj TiwaryManoj Tiwary slams CSK coaching staff for lacking courage to promote MS Dhoni up the order, as the star batter's late heroics proved too little, too late in their heavy defeat to RCB at Chepauk.

IPL 2025 Points Table, March 28: RCB cement top spot after CSK winRCB cemented their top spot in IPL 2025 after a dominant 50-run victory over CSK in Chepauk, breaking a 17-year winless streak at the venue. The emphatic win boosted their net run rate to +2.266 with two wins from two matches.

Ambati Rayudu questions CSK's batting strength after RCB hammering at ChepaukAfter CSK's embarrassing loss against Royal Challengers Bengaluru, Ambati Rayudu slammed the middle-order of the Chennai-based side. Rayudu ripped into the quality of the batters and said that CSK needed to shake things up if they were to remain alive in the competition.

IPL 2025: MS Dhoni breaks Suresh Raina's all-time CSK recordIPL 2025: MS Dhoni became CSK's highest run-scorer in IPL history, surpassing Suresh Raina. However, his unbeaten 30 went in vain as RCB broke their 17-year Chepauk jinx with a commanding 50-run victory.

Watch: RCB chants echo in Chepauk as CSK fans silenced after rare defeatChepauk echoed with "RCB, RCB" chants as Bengaluru stunned CSK with a 50 to end their 17-year winless streak at the iconic stadium.  Despite the many doubts  and criticism,   RCB dominated CSK in what was a one-sided match on March 28.

Virat Kohli, MS Dhoni's bromance goes viral after RCB's historic win over CSKRoyal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) batter Virat Kohli was seen hugging MS Dhoni after his team's win over Chennai Super Kings (CSK) in Match 8 of the Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025). RCB beat CSK by 50 runs as Rajat Patidar was adjudged Player of the Match.

Lost by just 50 runs: Ruturaj's bizarre comments after RCB hammer CSK irk fansChennai Super Kings (CSK) captain Ruturaj Gaikwad made a bizarre comment on his team's loss against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) in Indian Premier League 2025 (IPL 2025) as he said that they only lost by 50 runs and not a big margin.

RCB breach fortress Chepauk, clinch first win in Chennai in 17 yearsRoyal Challengers Bengaluru breached fortress Chepauk to make it two in the Indian Premier League 2025. Captain Patidar and the bowlers starred as the visitors clinched a clinical victory by 50 runs.

IPL 2025: MS Dhoni bats below R Ashwin in CSK vs RCB, fans slam tacticsChennai Super Kings (CSK) wicketkeeper batter MS Dhoni wasn't sent out to bat against Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) early despite the required run rate climbing.

17-year-old Anahat Singh beats Helen Tang to clinch Indian Open squash women's titleIndia's women's number one squash player Anahat Singh beat Helen Tang of Hong Kong to win her sixth title on the bounce, and 11th in total. The victory helped her earn 300 ranking points.

Hit on helmet, struggle vs spin: Virat Kohli trolled after forgetful outing vs CSKRoyal Challengers Bengaluru's Virat Kohli was trolled on social media after a struggling knock against Chennai Super Kings on Friday, March 28. Kohli was dismissed for 31 off 30 balls.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
